title: my boyfriend is so cute ! (share stories here)
body:
"we played risk (the board game) on schoolies. It was myt first time and Marcuz was really brutal and did something that got me out. I was really upset about it so i hid in the cupboard for like an hour till he apologized!" 

is what he texted me hahahahahhahahahahaha

replies.body: That sounds like the perfect setup for Paranormal Activity 87: Board Games Night.

LOOOOL. I'm not exactly sure what that means but that sounds funny when I think about it in my http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/creepypasta/images/e/ee/Spongebob-imagination.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20140908000844 land. xD

He got in the cupboard for an hour over a boardgame?

Probably fapped
nah he says he just sat there like retart cos mad
